channel.title: Makeing an item Useable?
channel.description: I looked in all the tut but there isnt a tut to tell me how to make an item that when clicked on teleports me to another location or adds exp points to a stat. if any one can help me please help me. Im working on making custom teletabs using rune ess. and i want the teletabs to teleport to a certain spot and then the item gets deleted!!!

item.title: Makeing an item Useable?
item.dc:creator: @Projext Projext
item.description:
@Projext wrote:

Yer me neither you need to add the case under a certain void or case but I don’t know what that is…

Then when you find it make it tele you like:

teleportToX = xxxx;
teleportToY = yyyy;

Read full topic

item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

I know how to make it so if you use the item with another it can do that stuff, i don’t know about when you just click it.
